title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: On linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000). When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label. However, so does the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X). If it starts moving around, I think users will get confused.
OB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127, the tool items (including the pulldown menu icon and the close icon) move below the label.
EB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127, the tool items (including the pulldown menu icon and the close icon) should not move below the label.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view on linux, running build 20011127.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the tool items (including the pulldown menu icon and the close icon) move below the label.
